{{cpp/ranges/chunk_view/outer_iterator/title|operator*}}
{{cpp/ranges/chunk_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr value_type operator*() const;
}}

Returns the current chunk in the {{tt|chunk_view}}.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} be the underlying pointer, and {{rlpi|/#Nested classes|value_type}} be a nested class that is the value type of the {{rlp|/|iterator}}.

Equivalent to: {{c|return value_type(*parent_);}}.

Before invocation of this operator the expression {{c|1=*this == std::default_sentinel}} must be {{c/core|false}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current element (a chunk).
